title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server that lets you pull, run, and manage large language models locally with a single command.
highlights: run Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, Phi-3 locally

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models from any Python script.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama as a local LLM provider for chains, agents, and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama featuring chat history, model switching, and file upload.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with sync/async APIs, streaming, and embedding support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API; generate, chat, and pull models from Ruby apps.

title: ollama-cli (npm)
summary: Lightweight Node CLI that wraps Ollama endpoints for quick prompts and model management.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that replaces GitHub Copilot with a local Ollama model for inline code suggestions.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app that connects to a local Ollama server via the official JS client.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake providing reproducible builds and dev shells for Ollama and its CUDA variants.

title: ollama-hass
summary: Home Assistant custom component exposing Ollama as a conversation agent for local smart-home queries.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama with strong typing, streaming, and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing code against local LLMs.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama featuring Tokio, Serde, and native streaming support.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client for Ollama with idiomatic interfaces and built-in context cancellation.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that forwards user prompts to a local Ollama instance and streams replies in threads.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Community-curated list of custom Ollama Modelfiles for fine-tuned, quantized, and domain-specific LLMs.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal reference implementation of retrieval-augmented generation using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain.
